mapper.sql: id, user_id, order_num, price, pay_status, pay_type, pay_price, order_status, sheep_id, serial_number, name, phone, pay_time, create_time, modify_time
mapper.select: select orders.id, orders.order_num, orders.sheep_id from st_claim_order orders where orders.order_num = #{oid}

select orders.id, orders.user_id, orders.order_num, orders.price, orders.pay_status, orders.pay_type, orders.pay_price, orders.order_status, orders.sheep_id, orders.serial_number, orders.name, orders.phone, orders.pay_time, orders.create_time, orders.modify_time, orders.address, orders.remark , sheep.sheep_img, sheep.sheep_nickname, sheep.sheep_breeds_id from st_claim_order orders LEFT JOIN st_sheep sheep ON sheep.id = orders.sheep_id where orders.id = #{id}

select orders.id, orders.user_id, orders.order_num, orders.price, orders.pay_status, orders.pay_type, orders.pay_price, orders.order_status, orders.sheep_id, orders.serial_number, orders.name, orders.phone, orders.pay_time, orders.create_time, orders.modify_time, orders.address, orders.remark , sheep.sheep_img from st_claim_order orders LEFT JOIN st_sheep sheep ON sheep.id = orders.sheep_id where orders.user_id = #{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND orders.order_status >= 0 ORDER BY create_time DESC limit #{offset},#{limit}
select COUNT(1) from st_claim_order where user_id = #{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND order_status >= 0

select orders.id, orders.user_id, orders.order_num, orders.price, orders.pay_status, orders.pay_type, orders.pay_price, orders.order_status, orders.sheep_id, orders.serial_number, orders.name, orders.phone, orders.pay_time, orders.create_time, orders.modify_time, orders.address, orders.remark , sheep.sheep_img from st_claim_order orders LEFT JOIN st_sheep sheep ON sheep.id = orders.sheep_id where orders.user_id = #{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND orders.order_status = #{type} ORDER BY create_time DESC limit #{offset},#{limit}
select COUNT(1) from st_claim_order where user_id = #{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND order_status = #{type}
mapper.insert: insert into st_claim_order (id, user_id, order_num, price, pay_status, pay_type, pay_price, order_status, sheep_id, serial_number, name, phone, create_time, pay_time, modify_time, address, remark ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sheepId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{address,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )

insert into st_claim_order
id,
user_id,
order_num,
price,
pay_status,

pay_price,
serial_number,
order_status,
sheep_id,
name,
phone,
pay_time,
create_time,
modify_time,
address,
remark,

mapper.update:
update st_claim_order
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pay_status = #{payStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pay_type = #{payType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pay_price = #{payPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
serial_number = #{serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sheep_id = #{sheepId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pay_time = #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
address = #{address,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update st_claim_order set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_status = #{payStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pay_type = #{payType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pay_price = #{payPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, serial_number = #{serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sheep_id = #{sheepId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_time = #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, address = #{address,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update st_claim_order set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_status = #{payStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pay_type = #{payType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pay_price = #{payPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, serial_number = #{serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sheep_id = #{sheepId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_time = #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
